data.title: Best cannolis in the world
data.text: I have been coming here since I was a kid.  They are the best cannolis I have ever had.  I buy the cannoli cake for daughter's birthday every year.  It is amazing.  The baker gets up every morning and makes the pastries fresh.  Can't say enough great things about this place

data.title: Delicious every time!
data.text: It doesn't matter if you have gotten their cookies, cakes or pastries, they are ALL delicious!!!  I absolutely love love love the cannoli cake! It is just to die for!  Their cookies are awesome too! And the staff is extremely accommodating! We also love their Easter wheat pie and meat pie! Just can't say enough about this bakery!

data.title: Extraordinary
data.text:
Del Prete Italian Pastry has been a staple of the Bridgeport, Connecticut, dining scene for generations.  Located on Main Street in this old industrial city, the storefront is easily accessible off of Route 8.  The shop is non-pretentious and features cookie and pastry cases overflowing with traditional Italian pastries.  Cannolis, Babas, and Sfogliatelle are our favorites and we are never disappointed with the quality, freshness, or taste.

By far, however, the hallmark of Del Prete's is their Italian Rum Cake.  Available in various sizes (9 inch being the smallest) the white cake is layered with pudding and fruit fillings.  Great rum flavor (subtle without being overpowering) accompanied by a wonderfully light frosting.  To complete the visual and taste appeal, the side of the cake is covered with nuts and or chocolate shots (I like 1/2 and 1/2).  The cake is moist without being soggy.  The flavors subtle but not hidden.  In my opinion, this is the finest rum cake available.

It is worth a visit to try their signature dessert and you will not be disappointed.  Do not attempt to make your first visit on a holiday weekend unless you are prepared for a very long wait.  A line stretching out the door - down the sidewalk - and around the corner is a testament to the wonderful experience that is Del Prete's.

data.title: Del Prete Italian Pastry
data.text: Del Prete is the best Italian bakery around.  It compares to NYC Italian pastry and I think they are at least equal to the best there.  My grandparents always used them and our family continues to use them for cakes and pastries for holidays, weddings and birthdays!  Of course the favorite is the cannoli and the cannoli cake!!  Their Italian cakes made with rum or cherry juice are also excellent!  The place is nothing to look at and has been the same for decades, but you get the freshest and most delicious Italian baked goods every time!  If there is a line out the door - its worth the wait!

data.title: Best cannoli you'll ever have!
data.text: This is by far my favorite bakery! The cannolis are to die for compared to any other one you've ever had, maybe some competition from Mulberry St in NYC. Their assortment is perfect and they do custom orders. Small shop on a busy street but worth the trek into Bridgeport.

data.title: Cannoli's!
data.text: Best cannoli's in town and might I add they make an awesome cannoli cake, as well as a rum cake. Very tasty, fresh pastries!!

data.title: Married to..
data.text: I was introduced to Del Prete by my in laws, they are now my go to pastry shop. A fun thing for a shower or party is the giant cannoli... yummy!

data.title: Best Cannolis Ever
data.text: Stopped by there Saturday morning to pick up 30 small cannoli for a Wedding shower that day. The bakery is immaculate and the staff is friendly. The prices are more than reasonable. The canolis came in a beautiful circular tray and they were the hit of the Shower. Del Prete has had quality Italian pastries for zillions of years. It is located in Bridgeport, Connecticut on Main Street. I also bought 2 small chocolate pie pastries for my wife and they were delicious. I forget the Italian name for it. Thanks Del Prete !!!!!

data.title: This is what a bakery is all about!
data.text:
Always has been and continues to be the best Italian bakery in the tri-state area.
the cannoli, sfoglia tal's, pasta chote's, napoleons, the list is so long of the great specialties Del Prete offers.
The Italian butter cookies are still the best in the world.
And I love how they box my order and tie it with the red string!
They have a cannoli cake to die for!!

data.title: Sweet!!
data.text: A tried and true Bridgeport tradition, much better than the other shops in the area. The cannoli cake is FANTASTIC hands down the best if you like cannolis. The mini pastries are fresh and well made, as are the cakes, the chocolate mousse cake is also on the top of our list!!! Prices are reasonable.

data.title: The best italian bakery ever!
data.text: Every product in the store is freshly made everyday. Never had a bad pastry or cake. The canollis are my fav. If your having a party I suggest the canolli cake. Order ahead they don't keep them hanging around.

data.title: Worth the wait on Christmas Eve
data.text: This gem of a bakery had a 90-minute wait to get to the counter on Christmas Eve.  While not pleasant, the oohs and aahs from everone at our Christmas dinner made this trip worth it.  Advice:  ask for the unfilled cannoli shells and separate filling, then fill them yourself before serving -- the crispiness and taste are preserved.
